name: Pool Academy
description:
Back of Jewel Case - PlayStation (EU) (from Ad Blurbs)

Put on your bow tie and black waistcoat and prepare for an evening of Pool !

  • 4 game modes including a trickshot section
  • 8 players to compete against
  • Help from the pro to improve your techniques and skills
Join the Academy... and discover all the secrets of Pool

releases.country: France, Germany, Italy, Spain, United Kingdom
